title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 303.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 303.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

These rules and regulations are in compliance with
subdivisions 12-b, 12-c, and 12-d of section 307 of article 7 of the Education

Law and are intended to serve as a guide for the making of payments to eligible
persons for moving expenses as well as for any additional incidental and
supplemental relocation payments upon their displacement and relocation from
real property acquired pursuant to such law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
303.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
